A New Life in Hyghel.
You canâ€™t complain, your new family loves you dearly and your new work is exiting. 
You love exploring the jungle and playing around with your new friends. 
After an adjusting period, where you overcome your homesickness, you feel great! H
yghel is your home now, and you are finally happy. 
After several years you decide to start visiting your old family regularly. 
However, you never stay for too long.
